Follow this format for all commit messages:

[Header]
{type}: {Short summary in Korean}

[Body]

- {Detailed change description in Korean}
- {Detailed change description in Korean}

Guidelines:

1. {type} must be lowercase English (feat, fix, chore, docs, refactor, etc.).
2. Please use a variety of commit types to accurately reflect the nature of the changes.
3. Header summary and Body descriptions must be in Korean.
4. Be detailed in the body using '-' bullet points for each significant change.
5. Keep technical terms in English
